Ultra Magnus: Here we go, Kiddo. Hold on!

He revved up the engine and got =
out of the compound. He got onto the
highway and drove up to the air transp=
ort to take them out of the
city. At the gate, he gave out his id.

Ultra M=
agnus: This is Sergeant Magnus and Corporal Venomia, right in
the back. We'=
re leaving on an assignment trip with governmental orders.

The gate lowere=
d and let them pass. Soon, he rolled onto the air
carrier's floor. The tran=
sport started lifting off with a deaf shudder.

Ultra Magnus: So, Venomia, =
is this your first time on the air carrier?
